title: The Begining After The End
author: TurtleMe
description: The Beginning After The End follows King Grey, a powerful monarch who is reincarnated into a new world of magic and monsters, seeking redemption and a meaningful life beyond power.

title: Greatest Estate Developer
author: BK_Moon
description: A brilliant civil engineer is reincarnated into a fantasy world and uses his knowledge to revolutionize land development and outsmart nobles.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set in a distant future, Dune follows Paul Atreides as he navigates politics, prophecy, and survival on the desert planet Arrakis, the only source of the universe’s most valuable substance.

title: Steins Gate
author: Chiyomaru Shikura
description: A group of friends accidentally discover time travel and face dire consequences as they try to alter timelines and prevent tragic events.

title: Re:Zero − Starting Life in Another World
author: Tappei Nagatsuki
description: A young man is summoned to a new world and discovers he can rewind time upon death.

title: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
author: Fuse
description: A man is reborn as a slime in a magical land and gains powerful allies and skills.

title: Golden Time
author: Yuyuko Takemiya
description: A college student with amnesia tries to rebuild his life and love, caught between his forgotten past and the challenges of his present.

title: Sweet Home
author: Carnby Kim
description: When a mysterious apocalypse turns people into monsters, a reclusive teenager must fight for survival—and his humanity—inside a quarantined apartment complex.
